name: Red River Bank
description: Red River Bank is a full-service community bank headquartered in Alexandria, Louisiana, focused on providing personalized banking services to individuals, businesses, and communities across Central and North Louisiana. Established in 2006, Red River Bank has rapidly grown to become a trusted financial partner, offering a range of products including personal and business checking accounts, savings accounts, loans, mortgages, and investment services. The bank prides itself on its commitment to exceptional customer service, fostering long-term relationships with its clients. Red River Bank actively participates in community development, investing in local initiatives and supporting various charitable organizations. With a mission to enhance the quality of life for its customers and communities, Red River Bank emphasizes local decision-making and a community-oriented approach to banking. The bank's skilled team of professionals works diligently to provide innovative financial solutions tailored to meet the unique needs of its clients, while also ensuring the highest standards of integrity and customer care. As a member of the FDIC, Red River Bank is dedicated to maintaining the safety and security of its customers’ deposits, promoting financial literacy, and contributing to the economic growth of the region.

seo.meta_title: Red River Bank | Community Banking in Louisiana
seo.meta_description: Discover Red River Bank, a community bank in Louisiana dedicated to providing personalized banking services and supporting local communities. Explore our financial products and services.

faq.question: What services does Red River Bank offer?
faq.answer: Red River Bank offers personal and business banking services including checking and savings accounts, loans, and mortgages.

faq.question: Where is Red River Bank headquartered?
faq.answer: Red River Bank is headquartered in Alexandria, Louisiana, USA.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Red River Bank?
faq.answer: John E. P. Hennigan is the CEO of Red River Bank.

faq.question: When was Red River Bank founded?
faq.answer: Red River Bank was founded in 2006.

faq.question: Does Red River Bank support local communities?
faq.answer: Yes, Red River Bank actively invests in local initiatives and supports various charitable organizations.
